text:
[Verse]
Sunset fades to night
City lights so bright
We dance in the streets
Hearts skipping beats

[Verse 2]
Warm breeze through the air
Hands caught unaware
Laughter echoes loud
Lost in the crowd

[Chorus]
Under summer rain
We forget the pain
Every drop a kiss
Pure hidden bliss

[Verse 3]
Neon glows above
Whisper words of love
Puddles at our feet
Our hearts in repeat

[Bridge]
Lightning in your eyes
Thunder as our prize
Nothing feels the same
In this summer rain

[Chorus]
Under summer rain
We forget the pain
Every drop a kiss
Pure hidden bliss
title: Summer Rain
